lines.text: If we sleep, she'll do better.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can also, I believe, and correct me if I'm wrong, burn a Greater Restoration and knock that down one more, I believe, in a pinch.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Now, may I ask you all now that we're all safe and sound and enjoying these shitty salads, so you fought your way to the top of a castle?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you, like, decimate everything on your way through?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And we passed by a monster or two.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We successfully sneaked past a big demon guy doing wall art.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. Do we have to go back through this labyrinth of horrors to get down or--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have actually discussed how we're getting home, but we didn't--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think he's speaking-- you're speaking of the entire--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No no, I was speaking specifically about we're on top of something that we need to get off of.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, if I recall quite a bit of it fell so I think we're much closer to the ground at this point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, like ten feet of some walls fell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We do have an endless rope.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you want to go back down?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, probably in the Bag of Holding.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I could turn us into clouds and we could just float down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it a problem it's real windy outside?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you want help with that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I use wisdom? I'm not wise about the weather? No? Oh, just straight intelligence, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It would be a bad idea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys would be kites in a wind storm.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We can always just climb down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you sure you don't want to go back down by the big nasty now that you got your--?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think it quite-- I think we want to get our stuff back and get out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Here's the thing, we don't have any powerful spells because we don't have any components.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No problem, I've never had those.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Could I Animal Shapes us into things that fly, would that be a bad idea?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, it will be difficult.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So still flying, just flying is a bad idea?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Flying-- I didn't want to bust out my broom up here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's just going to be difficult, like the wind is pretty intense around here and it feels like it's near perpetual hurricane without the moisture.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we know how long of a fall it is from the top to the ground because I could always just like, "Wee!" (splat) eat it a little bit and I catch everybody.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If it's a thousand feet, it's a bad idea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't have a good scope, necessarily, because you guys spent a lot of it climbing in the interior of the tower, but you've been traveling upwards over an hour, like two plus hours to get up through to the top of the tower.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Should we assume that any spell that takes any material components is busted right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or have a money cost involved.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: While they're having this discussion, Lieve'tel is casting Regenerate on her forehead to return it to is pristine condition, and Thaumaturgy to clean the gnome shit off her face.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Prestidigitation. Thaumaturgy makes your eyes change color.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, water, water actually does that job as well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We should Heroes' Feast before we got to sleep, because we forgot that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear a (popping) as the fossil just ejects itself from--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh we can't do Heroes'-- Fuck.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've got an idea. So look, we've got to go down through the castle thing, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's like somewhere down there, what if we're like, "Yoo-hoo," and we call it up and it comes out, we run down?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could, but first--is there any sort of magicking we can do to find the location of Bob?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, I can cast Locate Object.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Without material components? and also does that have a range, a distance range?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hmm, yeah, that's not that much.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let me see how to scry because I'm assuming my scrying eye got stolen?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you still have your objects.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I still have my scrying eye?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He didn't rob you of everything you have.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How did he do that? He must be really good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You saw where he stood like ten feet from you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He never came close to you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He could have stopped time for us briefly, robbed us all, and then come back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can talk to crazy people.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I could scry because I have a--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Lieve'tel has finished washing her face and absolving her skull of the errant matter that you've jammed into it during the resurrection process, you lay out the scrying ritual, focusing on and looking for--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The tuning fork for the plane or--?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or the Bag of Holding, right? Is that pretty--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It could be any of that stuff. It's up to you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In case, you know-- The guy. Bob.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's the title of the show.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He already fenced all the stuff.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't remember how any of this works.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As your vision begins to emerge and push itself into the wind storm, you feel yourself being drawn through this intense battering buffet of wind from every direction. (whooshing) And you continue to be drawn through in this arc. You sense a direction from where you're standing. It's pulled through, pulled through.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's Key West. Sorry, keep going. Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see tucked along the remnants of these walls a desk and some shelves and a bed, and there you see, going through a bag of equipment and cataloging all manner of things that you guys once had on your person-- Bob.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's squatting in some ruins cataloging all of our stuff, which makes me think that time is of the essence because maybe he's going to pawn them or something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How do you pawn that here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know. I mean, there's people like Bob, so why couldn't there be more people like Bob?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What if he's just like Little Mermaid?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because he wants to be closer to humanity or something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if he doesn't know what any of it is actually for?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Your scrying eye, while powerful and amazing, can't really pinpoint a location, can it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say you got a general direction from where you are.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's down the mountain back where we came, hang to the left a little bit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was looking at the other left and then like a collapsed building.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, so we can find it just from your--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What are we discussing? How to get home?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, actually, technically, I think so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To be fair, Pike, I probably wouldn't want a fossil in my forehead either.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I didn't live to be 350 years old without learning a trick or two.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She just said she didn't live to be 350--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't you think I wear it well?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Mr. Bell does, don't you, Mr. Bell?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter) Apparently, I have an accent all of a sudden.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did he rob from you as well?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He took a pinky bone of a man who died a long time ago.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, then perhaps you would have a motivation for finding him as well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you trying a find a person, a place?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've sort of located him through Keyleth's impressive and powerful magic. Why? Do you have a trick up your sleeve that can help?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can Find the Path, yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's down the mountain towards the way we came, hang a little bit to the left and then you'll find some buildings--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think what she means is, what did it look like?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, what it did look like?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: With a desk and a lantern you said.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Uh huh, and he was cataloging things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think it was probably windy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Very, very windy. It was actually less windy, because it was set down a little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Boxes, chests, things that this individual Bob seems to be keeping all his things in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't think I have the--no, he buggered off with things I need.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, if there's something that we need, a particular component, I can help us with that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can make things with my mind.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are they things that actually work?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's called The Secret. If you think about something-- (laughter) -you just envision it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can only do it once and I don't want to waste it on an egg.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're going to sleep, right? I mean, we're going to sleep before we find Bob.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could sleep, but I could use this and then sleep.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh that's a very good idea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it like real though, or is it like your counterfeit furniture that you hawked?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, it would be real, but I can make us a component if you need it or I could just--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So you could just make us a tuning fork and we could go home?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I understand, and honestly, I don't mind staying here. As soon as we go home, we have to deal with the real world.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is my home. This is my magnificent mansion.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I got it when the market was bottomed out and, you know, it was a good sound investment.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we just stay here for--?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You would never find a deal like that in Vasselheim.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What components would you need for this particulate locate spell?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I used this to find your friend, but-- because he was in a location you were searching for, but I need something from where this Bob is, which we don't have and I don't think you can make.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, if there's something to get us down the mountain faster.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (as Grog) I mean, is that really what the big problem is? How we get down?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Through the building or off the side?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep, sometimes the simplest answer is the shortest point between two ideas.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know about everybody else though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will say so you're aware, Lieve'tel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The spell you're trying requires an object from the location you wish to find, but you need to have it in your hand, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Which is what I'm saying. It wouldn't work, because I don't have anything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why don't you turn us all into something very small? Percival, you put us in your pocket and you walk on down the tower?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yo, Vex, up top. Smash hands.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I get about an hour out of the boots, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What if we were all, like, lady bugs?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, we'll be a little stronger.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You could be a weasel, maybe.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Then we wouldn't blow away, just in case.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, ladybugs. They could blow away and no one would notice.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Then, if he put us in his pocket, we could smash.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's no limitation to it, as long as you have the boots on, as long as you want to, climb along surfaces. There's no limitation to the time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The boots are endless, aren't they?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I thought they had an activation--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's sleep and do that and then head down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't have to have anything fancy for Animal Shapes?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's awesome. I could just do that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How long does Animal Shapes last?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So if you do it now?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We could do it now, sleep, and then I could just grab everybody else, get us downstairs.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we want to use Scanlan's fancy spell to make a chalice so we can have a Heroes' Feast?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's also a very good idea.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We also could have done that for a diamond so she didn't have to use her wedding ring.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We couldn't use my ring to make a chalice, so there you go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, we're going to do some Heroes' Feasting.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Plus, you get to renew your vows!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was thinking the Slayer's Cake.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're trying to attempt to create--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can make one object up to 25,000 gold pieces in value that isn't magic.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will wish for a chalice worth 24,999 gold pieces.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, how would you like to wish for this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How would I like to wish for this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (like Cher) ♪ If you believe in life after gnome ♪ (echoing) ♪ after gnome, after gnome ♪ ♪ I can see something so pure and clean ♪ ♪ I really can't help but drink out of it oh ♪

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: ♪ If you believe in life after gnome ♪ (echoing) ♪ After gnome, after gnome ♪ That's it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With a little clockwork piece where if you-- (click) it can extend to have a little stem to it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pop me off one of those jewels, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, it's like a bowl, but then you can make it into a wine glass and then inside are all our faces etched.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a bowl you got on Sky Mall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can't we just wish for boxed wine?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Give me one of those jewels. Pop it out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so are you guys taking a night's rest?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Heroes' Feast and then night's rest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so who's casting Heroes' Feast?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The feast is summoned, a beautiful spread of divinely crafted and conjured food, much like the spread upon this table, crackers and cinnamon rolls and cheeses and grapes and meats. It's delightful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As part of that, everyone becomes cured of all diseases and poisons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You make all wisdom saving throws with advantage and, Pike, go ahead and roll 2d10 for everyone to increase their maximum hit points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, no death saves, just wisdom saves.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're confusing the chalice with Beacon of Hope.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Damn it. Okay, sorry about that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And we add how much to our hit points total?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So ten hit points added to everyone's maximum hit point total for the next 24 hours.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, are we turning into animals before we go to sleep so that we Keyleth saves a spell?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What-- (clears throat) what room will you be sleeping in t-tonight? In yours?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, I was thinking so, but--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, cool. I'll just have them run up some cold water for you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Thank you. You're sleeping in your room, right?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Your double wide? Mine's only a twin.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Everyone has a twin bed except for me, yes.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, you have the double wide?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The double wide in the shape of the heart, yes.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I didn't realize it was in the shape of a heart.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do you sleep like this or do you sleep in the middle of it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I sleep whatever way suits me that night.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can and I come in and just hop on it for a while?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You want to come in with me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a little tricky because it is a water bed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It doesn't--doesn't have a lot of bounce to it, but if you time the waves, it'll fling you up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. We'll have a jumping on the bed party.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you jumping on the bed?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Question, did you take your armor off before getting on the water bed and jump on the bed?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel as if that's relevant.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let me teach you the wisdom of the ages.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that in reference to some sort of meditation--?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Some people get frisky when they get brought back to life, you know. It happens.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so as all of you retire to your evening, you guys have a water bed bouncing party.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can say it. I rang his bell. It happened.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter) Sorry, I'm a slow eater. I'm going to go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You just sleep on the floor like a dog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck yeah. Where else would I be, man? Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Your little sand training pit? Don't you love it down there?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yeah! There's a sand pit! I go find my favorite spot and I spin twice in a circle and then get--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, it's so good to be back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anything else you guys would like to do before you continue with your journey?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just real quick, we're going to do the mouse thing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to get us off this tower.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast Pass Without a Trace on you, dear, before we go. Just right before.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Will that stick if I cast Pass Without a Trace and then turn into a mouse?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're still concentrating on the spell.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to peek out the door to see what it looks like out there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The worst thing I can do is just drop everybody off the side and you'll just turn into humans once you hit the ground and will just be in slight pain.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, all those hit points will carry over and I imagine the hit points of a mouse are about the same amount as the hit points of a goldfish so I don't want to potentially fuck that up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Perhaps a bag of sparrows or some such.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I meditate and I'm going to cast my 9th-level spell and give Percy Foresight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Which just lasts for eight hours.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, oh oh, brain freeze. Oh god, oh god.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What did you just do to him?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You might feel a little adrenaline rush, little light headed. You can't be surprised, you have an advantage on all attack rolls, ability checks, saving throws, and other creatures have disadvantage on attack rolls against you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're seeing the moment you're in and a moment six seconds ahead of you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a dual reality and, at first, it's really frightening and it takes a moment for you to focus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't even know how to process what you just did to me, but I'll figure it out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You tap into, like, plant magic and there might be multiple timelines.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This will be mine for a minute.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to throw something at the back of his head real quick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, roll an attack at disadvantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six. What do you throw at him?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have intercept anyway so, yeah-- I can, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You throw the vase and he catches it in his hand.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, I was just seeing if his Foresight was working.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So what are we getting transformed into?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or small sparrows, so that you can't technically fall.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh oh, yeah, yeah, yeah, birdies.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You'll get flung around a bit, but at least you can dive down at a speed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we all fine with being birds shoved in your pocket?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Raise your hand if you're fine with being a bird.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How does Sir Bertrand Bell feel?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I turn us all into Birds Machina.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh wait, I cast Pass Without a Trace.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's got a little small gathering of sparrows.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Scanlan and Pike are love birds.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I got a little turquoise feather.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, you're like the little indigo buntings.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm opening the door to look out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, actually it would be a single roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You and your arm filled with birds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you've jammed a bunch of birds in your pockets and you're standing there looking out into darkness.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am going to just make a bloody break for the side of the wall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have fire? Do you have anything to set on fire?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What did I used to do for this? I have a thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't you have a lantern with a--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's literally birds are in your pocket.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So I'm definitely trying to get it--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You step down, your feet touching the stones as you head--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try and give myself a little bit of unanticipated movement in an attempt to just be difficult to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's disadvantage on the stealth check but you have advantage because of Foresight so it's a straight roll. Roll a stealth check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check with advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are all being crushed and knocked around and it's not a pleasant experience.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look, Dagon has made some weird fucking noises.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Has anything-- have I gotten a vibe of anything around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do because as you're looking down on one of the little-- there's a little outcropping and you can see two howlers that are currently curled up, one of them getting up and looking out and sniffing on the wind.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to go away from that, then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They don't seem to notice you as you pass by.

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.text: Lieve pushes herself to standing and looks at legends and casts Mass Heal, 700 hit points divvied up among the crew.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (as Bertrand) If it's all the same--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bertrand starts walking out of Whitestone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nice, that's right. I'll forget it again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll write a song about him. He deserved it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys look over and there's a thorn bush and he's currently like, "Ow, ow, ow."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not going to get any better.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I suppose if you want to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have you ever thought about using Modify Memory to make someone happy?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, wait, what are we doing with him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Weren't we going to try to send him to Limbo?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Would Greater Restoration work on his mind?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see he's somehow manipulating it with some force of his mind.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm just going to try to help you for just a moment.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Maybe you will in a little bit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm holding a weird little action.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I place my hand on his shoulder and I'll cast Greater Restoration.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Pike of-- Pike Trickfoot of Vox Machina and I live here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For how long, I do not know, but you've helped me find my way again."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm very, very glad that we were able to take you out of that place.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What did you go there for?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I just forgot that I didn't."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you need any help getting home?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Here, what do you love in your heart, little Pike Trickfoot?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, I love this family, this whole group of people that you see and my best buddy Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I hope this is gift enough for the family that you care for."

lines.name: SSAM
lines.text: Is there a way mine could just be a few inches taller?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think it may have possibly contributed to my madness."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll analyze it later, before you--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Anyway, I worry what awaits me back in Shraklore."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Darling, before you go, something else my friend Pike loves is her spell components, which you still have.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You wouldn't happen to have the pinky bone of a dead man, would you? Did you scoop that up by any chance?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Unfortunately, I think that was residing somewhere across the chamber," in that chest there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But should you ever go back to Limbo, it should still be where it was left."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know there's a surefire way to get back there, you just got to find the-- by the way, what did you guys do with my cards?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's a really good question.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We left them there, yeah, Grog.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can get you some other cards.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How about we make our own set? We can make drawings on some cards and make your own? We can make a game of it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What things do you want to be on the deck?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And, like, blood and, like, peanut butter and, like, lettuce.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm all right to leave now. This is good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lettuce would be one of the bad cards.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We'll get you a deck of cards.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy's nose is just bleeding in the corner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, mayhaps we cross paths again."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In the blink of your eye, he's gone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I wish everyone left that quickly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you remember the entire speech now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll turn to Le'veon Bell and say--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What lies next for you in your path?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's a shrine to the Raven Queen in the west, if you can find it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And a room for you, of course.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If it's all right, I'll stay awhile with Mr. Bell before we return home.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Lieve, when you were, you know, dead for an hour or two, did you see anybody? Do you remember anything? Did you-- you know, I'm just curious.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've lived a long time and I know many things, but I don't see all, nor does she share all.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are their threads relatively safe for the time being?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I watch and they are safe, yes."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Will this one eventually be happy?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will see you all for dinner, I hope.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He has better qualities that one, better than speaking anyway.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We should risk our lives and nearly die at least once a year, I think. Seems very reasonable.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Like a concert in the front row.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You need to change for dinner.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to go get dressed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know where you sleep, my lady.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And I'll be there sleeping tidily with this memory forever."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Walk as dignified as I can, right past.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have plenty of dresses if you like."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will see the end of you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't know if I want dinner tonight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you all step in towards Whitestone Castle, we pull back on the beautiful light snowscape of the courtyard of the city.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As we're walking, I'm just going to subtly take Pike's hand and hold it as we walk in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One for yes, two for no, three for-- ooh! (laughing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (applause) (cheering) Search for Bob. Search for Grog.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Next sequel, Search for Purvan's Finger.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Next game, we can have our wedding.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How did you, just in the game?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, keep that down, keep that down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We were going to do the summer vacation one-shot, too, right? Destination wedding.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god, they are those assholes, I'm so in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, we're totally going to do a destination wedding adventure, where what could possibly go wrong?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're lucky we're not making you Plane Shift to get there, motherfuckers!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I've already got some ideas percolating now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh no. Oh, Laura, that's so good. That's so good.
